trigger_event: Code commit to a feature branch
success_criteria: Linting passes; >90% unit test coverage on new/changed code; 100% unit test pass rate; No new critical/high vulnerabilities in dependency scan (Snyk).
escalation_procedure: PR author must fix issues before merge.
business_impact: Prevents low-quality code and known vulnerabilities from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: 100% integration test pass rate; API contract tests pass; Docker image builds and passes vulnerability scan (Trivy).
failure_action: Block deployment to Staging; Send alert to dev team.
escalation_procedure: On-call developer investigates and reverts or hotfixes.
business_impact: Prevents broken service interactions from reaching the integrated test environment.

trigger_event: Manual trigger for a release candidate
success_criteria: 100% pass rate on E2E smoke test suite; No P0 or P1 bugs open; Performance tests show no regression >5% from baseline; Manual sign-off from QA Lead and Product Owner.
failure_action: Block deployment to Production; Release is postponed.
responsible_team: QA Team, Product Owner, DevOps Team
business_impact: Final quality check to prevent critical defects from impacting users and revenue.
